name: diesel
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C1 [ U ] a type of heavy oil used as fuel: a diesel engine My new car runs on (= uses) diesel.
[ C ] any vehicle, especially a train, that has a diesel engine

a type of heavy oil used as a fuel
A diesel is also any vehicle that has an engine using this type of oil as fuel.
